gurmukhi: ieiq sRI bicqR nwtky rwm Avqwr kQw Kr dUKx deIq bDh iDAwie smwpqm squ ]6]
transliteration: It(i) Sribachitra Naatke Ram Kathaa Khar Dookhan Daeet Badhah Dhiaae Samaptam Sat(u)||6||
translation: End of the story of the killing of KHAR and DUSHMAN in Ramvatar in BACHITTAR NATAK.
Now begins the description of the abduction of Sita :

gurmukhi: rwvx nIc mrIc hUM ky giH bIc gey b`D bIr sunYhY ]
transliteration: Raavan Neech Marich Hoon Ke Grih Beech Gad Baddh Beer Sounaihai||
translation: Hearing about the killing of Khar and Dushan the vile Ravan went to the house of Marich.

gurmukhi: bIshUM bwNih hiQAwr ghy irs nwr mnY dssIs DunY hY ]
transliteration: Bees-hoon Baandh(i) Hathiaar Gade Tis Naar Mania Das-sees Dhounai Hai||
translation: He held his weapons in all his twenty hands and was furiously muzzling his ten heads.

gurmukhi: nwk ktXo ijn sUpnKw kh qau iqhko duK doK lgY hY ]
transliteration: Naak Katyo Jin Soopnakhaa Kah Tau Tihko Doukh Dokh Lagad Hai||
translation: He said, “Those who have chopped the nose of Surapankha, their such action has agonised me;

gurmukhi: rwvl ko bnu kY pl mo Cl kY iqh kI GrnI Dir lXYhY ]348]
transliteration: Raaval Ko Ban(u) Kai Pal Mo Chhal Kai Tih Kigharnidhar(i) Lyai-hai||348||
translation: “I shall steal their wife in the garb of a Yogi form the forest in your company.”348.

gurmukhi: nwQ AnwQ snwQ kIXo kir kY Aiq mor kiRpw kh Awey ]
transliteration: Naath Anaath Sanaath Keeyo Kar(i) Kai At(i) Mor Kridaa Kahh Aae||
translation: “O my Lord ! You had been very kind to came to my place.

gurmukhi: Baun BMfwr AtI ibktI pRB Awj sBY Gr bwr suhwey ]
transliteration: Bhaoun Bhandaar Atibikatiprabh Aaj Sabhai Ghar Baar Suhaae||
translation: “My stores are overflowing on your arrival, O my Lord !

gurmukhi: dÍY kir jor krau ibnqI suinkY niRpnwQ buro mq mwno ]
transliteration: Dvai Kar(i) Jor Karau Bintisoun(i)kai Nripnaath Buro Mat Maano||
translation: “But with folded hands I request and kindly do not mind,

gurmukhi: sRI rGubIr shI Avqwr iqnY qum mwns kY n pCwno ]249]
transliteration: Sriraghoubeer Sahiavtaar Tinai Toum Maanas Kai Na Pachhaado||349||
translation: “That is my supplication that Ram is in reality an incarnation, do not consider him as a man like yourself.”349.
